A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie is not bad because it didn't aim to please the fan base. It is bad because it was poorly written and executed. 

The least we could expect was that Rian Johnson would develop the great characters that were introduced in TFA. Well\, he didn't! It seems as if he considered them to be boring or useless and just decided to kill them or ignore them. 

Beyond that\, the movie is filled with bad humour and plot holes. It is simply dissapointing.
